roland, antiqua housing agent.description: A thin man with big glasses and a whispy mustache and beard. He's dressed in a dark suit and a red tie.
roland, antiqua housing agent.response: If you're interested in Antiquan real estate, I'm your man! You are allowed to own a home in the city if you can afford a housing permit from me. Once you have used a housing permit, you may go to the neighbourhood entrance outside and travel to your new house!
